body: Catherine from Small Fish in the Big Taco shares colour coded images of "a very sleepy town in the state of Veracruz....namely Tlacotalpan." She calls Tlacotalpan, "the most colourful place in the globe!!"
original_body: Catherine from Small Fish in the Big Taco shares colour coded images of "a very sleepy town in the state of Veracruz....namely Tlacotalpan." She calls Tlacotalpan, "the most colourful place in the globe!!"
title: Mexico: Photos of Tlacotalpan, "the most colourful place in the globe"

sentence: Catherine from Small Fish in the Big Taco shares colour coded images of "a very sleepy town in the state of Veracruz....namely Tlacotalpan."
She calls Tlacotalpan, "the most colourful place in the globe!!"
